channel.title: 🏢 School of Computer Science, University of Sydney on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 School of Computer Science, University of Sydney on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Offline Behavior Distillation
item.description: This paper introduces Offline Behavior Distillation (OBD) to synthesize compact expert behavioral data from massive sub-optimal RL data, enabling faster policy learning.
